title: Stefan Kjartansson and Black Slabbath
content:
A friend of mine in Atlanta, GA (originally from Iceland) created a podcast discussing the design of his font Black Slabbath. Thought it might be inspirational.

[http://atlantapechakucha.com/Podcast/Vol-05/StefanKjartansson-PK05.m4a](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020203233/http:/atlantapechakucha.com/Podcast/Vol-05/StefanKjartansson-PK05.m4a "http://atlantapechakucha.com/Podcast/Vol-05/StefanKjartansson-PK05.m4a")
author: salisae
